title: PureFit 100% Dual Waterproof Couch Cover Slipcovers for Couches and Sofas - Stretch Non Slip Fleece Sofa Covers Washable, Leakproof Furniture Protector for Kids, Pets, Dog (Sofa, Beige)
description: WHY BUY A WATERPROOF SOFA SLIPCOVER ?
Because your couch is probably the most used - and abused - piece of furniture in your home.

A PureFit sofa covers for 3 cushion couch not only protect your furniture from all kinds of liquids, but it can also transform an old, worn out couch into the stunning centerpiece of your room. Waterproof sofa covers are designed for full protection (except for the bottom of the sofa).
Use high craftwork and technology, top fleece fabric is processed with waterproof treatment, and back coated with waterproof layer.
NON-SLIP WATERPROOF SLIPCOVERS THAT ACTUALLY STAYS IN PLACE

Our waterproof sofa slipcovers are meticulously engineered so that they stay in place! All our slipcovers feature a thick elastic hem that wraps at the bottom of the sofa furniture to ensure they don’t fall off.
We also include premium non-slip foam anchors that you tuck into the crease between the furniture’s back/arms and the cushions for a ensure non slipping or shifting couch slipcover.
Our form fit waterproof couch slipcovers are meticulously designed and ready-made to fit a variety of couch shapes and styles, but feel free to use these guidelines to ensure a good fit.
Sofa size measures Width:35”, High:33”, Depth:24” and Fits sofa with seats widths 60"-81".
When in doubt, go with the larger size. It's always better to have extra fabric so you can tuck extra deep.
We stand behind all of our high quality products
So we offer a 60 days No Question Asked on all our waterproof sofa covers. Please contact us (through Amazon if past the standard RETURN WINDOW) and we will be pleased to assist you.
